name: Rage You Out
description:
Rage You Out

A typical Rage Game with gets you RAge I know it can be easy but YEAH......

=========================================

Controls:

W or UpArrow  to move Up

S or DownArrow to move Down

D or RightArrow to move Right

A or LeftArrow to move Left

Space to Dash

Enter / Return to pause 

=============================================

Eat the pink food to gain  size so you could kill the enemy .......

=============================================

And for last information 

Subscribe to my Channel; I will be posting some dope Game Dev Videos:
